name: A.L.F.R.E.D.
description:
ATTENTION ALL PERSONNEL!!! THERE HAS BEEN A BREAKOUT IN THE LAB
Multiple creatures have escaped, the most dangerous of which is known as the A.L.F.R.E.D. or The Abnormal Large Friendly Radioactive Extraterrestrial Demon.
Don't get eaten or you will be Joined Together with A.L.F.R.E.D. for the rest of your miserable man-eating days.
Good luck, you'll need it. A scientist a day keeps the police away! Play with sound if you can Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

Mouse (Left Click) - Shoot Tentacle

M - Mute

E - Skip Through Text

Eating and joining together with scientists makes you bigger, faster, and stronger.

Getting spotted gives you 10 seconds to eat all of the scientists before you lose and have to restart.

Credits:

DragonDoodler222 - Programming, Audio, Music, Level Design

Geryon Games - Art, Programming, Audio

lowof - Audio

All assets were created in the span of the game jam (<48 hours) except for the Thaleah Fat Pixel Font free from the Unity Asset store
